content.rendered:
Directed by Rajeev Jhaveri.

Written by Rajeev Jhaveri.

Cast Rajeev Khandelwal(Armin Salem / Karan). Gauahar Khan(Kaavya Choudhary (as Gauhar Khan)). Gemma Atkinson(Rhea Wagner). Ankita Makwana(Grace Soni). Caterina Murino(Irina Caro). Victor Banerjee(Dr. David Roy) . Andres Jud(Florian Schneider). Joseph Paul(John Stone). Lara Wolf(Seductrice)

Language Hindi.

Producers Ravi Agrawal. Ajay Chabbria. Rajath Manjunath.

Production Niche Film Farm.
